channel.title: Cigarettes or Marijuana
channel.description: Personally I perfer both I usually smoke about 2-3 a day once before school and one or two after and usually smoke weed on the weekends, I just started picking up the (bad) habit a few weeks ago, I personally feel more confortable smoking weed but Cigarettes relax me more which one is your favorite I usually Smoke Arizona (weed) and Marlboro smooths (cigarettes) I like menthol.

item.description:
@A_Legend wrote:

I don’t really smoke as such, just the odd times, but still if i was going to smoke something I’d rather it be weed as at least it’s doing something.

item.title: Cigarettes or Marijuana
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:164, topic:236533”]You’re clueless. Keep smoking your schwag weed.

Urban Dictionary

Urban Dictionary: schwag

adj. Term used to describe low grade marijuana. This type of marijuana is usually brown, seedy, dry. The term is also used by many pot heads to describe anything that is low grade. noun. low grade marijuana


Read number 3.[/quote]don’t break his spirit, he thought that was good shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigarettes or Marijuana
item.dc:creator: @Gearsnare Gearsnare
item.description:
@Gearsnare wrote:

I do smoke cigarettes but I’m trying to quit as they are just a waste of money in my opinion, I’d rather have more money for weed. I’m only young but having been smoking weed for a couple of years, it calms me down and it’s not that expensive since it would only cost around £2 to get quite stoned. I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone who hasn’t tried it though since I do believe it is wrong and that I am slightly different because of it.

We live in a pretty fucked up world though, it’s easier for myself and most other kids I know to get cannabis than it is to get alcohol or cigarettes.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigarettes or Marijuana
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:151, topic:236533”][quote author=jme link=topic=312190.msg2645424#msg2645424 date=1233187078]

Cigarettes but I have reduced my smoking, I don’t smoke when I’m working or at home.
Weed is illegal here.

Lol how can you not smoke at work. Thats when I needed them the most.

And weed is illegal in just about every country. Doesn’t mean you can’t do it or enjoy it though.
[/quote]

I don’t know lol. I don’t stress about work, I like to work. (Easy moneeyhh)

Yea I could smoke weed and enjoy it, but because it’s illegal it is too expensive. I prefer alcohol because it’s much cheaper and I like to be drunk much more than high.

Imo weed is just too overpriced for the feeling you get, if it would be cheaper I would sure use it.[/quote]

Its the opposite here, weed is so cheap but alcohol is exspensive. If you buy in bulk it really only costs like 3-4 dollars to get high. Booze would cost me at least 20.

Read full topic

item.title: Cigarettes or Marijuana

Cigarettes but I have reduced my smoking, I don’t smoke when I’m working or at home.
Weed is illegal here.
[/quote]

Lol how can you not smoke at work. Thats when I needed them the most.

And weed is illegal in just about every country. Doesn’t mean you can’t do it or enjoy it though.[/quote]

I don’t know lol. I don’t stress about work, I like to work. (Easy moneeyhh)

Yea I could smoke weed and enjoy it, but because it’s illegal it is too expensive. I prefer alcohol because it’s much cheaper and I like to be drunk much more than high.

Imo weed is just too overpriced for the feeling you get, if it would be cheaper I would sure use it.

Read full topic
